y much for helping out.

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Lasse Koskel=
a" <lasse.koskela@...> wrote:
>
> Hi Heath,
> 
> I misunderstood what you m=
eant by "generating failures". Somehow I was
> thinking compilation failure=
s... Anyway, the problem is in the way you
> use the <batchtest/> element -=
- you're currently telling the JUnit
> task to run all "*.java" files as JU=
nit tests, which obviously doesn't
> work. Instead, you need to use pattern=
s like "*Test.java" and
> "Test*.java".
> 
> Lasse
> 
> -- 
> Lasse Koskela=

> * Author of "Test Driven" (Manning Publications, 2007) *
